Example UsageÂ¶

import MinePI
import asyncio

async def main():
    #Render a full body skin
    im = await MinePI.render_3d_skin("Herobrine")

    #Render a head only skin
    im = await MinePI.render_3d_head("Herobrine")

asyncio.run(main())
